revised_title: Enzymatic Hydrolysis of Hexosephosphate by Various Enzyme Preparations
tldr: The author investigates the ability of various enzyme preparations, including lipase, emulsin, and autolysed yeast-juice, to hydrolyze hexosephosphate. The results show that ricinus lipase, emulsin, and autolysed yeast-juice have varying degrees of hydrolytic action on hexosephosphate, while autolysed ox pancreas and zymin extract have little to no action. An alcohol-ether precipitation of autolysed yeast-juice also demonstrates significant activity towards hexosephosphate.
